ability: [ACT] [Siphon Red 2] Choose a [Dragoshield], and deal 1 damage to it.

name: Skiving Troop
flavor: Goblins are not very driven individuals, but they can be made to serve.

name: Sudden Eruption
flavor: It's hard to control an eruption. You kind of just… let it go and hope for the best.
ability: Deal 1 damage to all creatures, and you may Siphon 1. If you do, deal 1 damage to all creatures.

name: Raid
flavor: With the force of an avalanche, but the precision of a sharpshooter.
ability:
Choose any number of opposing creatures, and deal 10 damage divided as you choose among those creatures.
[Dice 1-2](Black)If a yellow or green creature was destroyed with this effect, your opponent discards a card from their hand.
[Fort Burst] Put this card into your discard pile, choose any number of opposing creatures, and deal 5 damage divided as you choose among those creatures.

name: Supreme Brutality
flavor: The strong survive, and the weak perish. So it has been, so it shall be.
ability:
Choose an opposing creature, and deal X damage to it, where X is the highest ATK among your creatures.
RED@1-2 Choose two opposing creatures instead, and divide the damage as you choose among them.

name: Titanic Force
flavor: When titans collide, eardrums shatter.
ability:
Ambush[②] (You may pay ② to play this card from your hand face-down at one of your forts.)
[AUTO] When this fort is attacked and this card is an ambush, choose a creature, and it deals damage to itself equal to its ATK.

name: Sennes, Lord of the Rampage
flavor: One of the five elder dragons. It rampages on instinct, destroying everything in front of it without thought.
ability:
[AUTO] [Dice 1-4](Black)When this creature attacks, choose a cost 2 or less creature from your discard pile, and return it to your hand.
[AUTO] [Dice 3-6](Black)When this creature is summoned, your opponent discards all but one card from their hand.
[CONT] [Dragocross](Any)If your opponent has two or less cards in their hand, this creature cannot be blocked by creatures.

name: Kaine, the Bane of Humans
flavor: Her belief is that humans are inferior and exist only as food and fodder for her.
ability:
[AUTO] When your other creature is destroyed, draw a card.
[AUTO] When this creature is destroyed, you may discard two cards from your hand. If you do, summon this creature, and if it is your opponent's turn, [REST] this creature.
[CONT] [Dragocross](Black)When this creature deals damage to a fort, it deals 2 damage instead.

name: Dark Diviner
flavor: She can see all fates, and those she deems unlucky may die by her hand.
ability: [ACT] [Siphon Black 4] Each player discards a card from their hand. Choose a cost 2 or less creature from your discard pile, and return it to your hand.

name: Necros, the Unending
flavor: "You almost got me that time! Come, let's do that again."
ability:
[AUTO] When you discard this card from your hand, if you have a black banner, you may summon it.
[AUTO] [Dragocross](Black)When this card is destroyed, return it to your hand.

name: Ichorback Whelp
flavor: The sharp spines on its back contain a deadly venom that gets more potent as it ages.
ability:
[AUTO] When this creature attacks, choose an opposing cost 3 or less [REST] creature, and destroy it.
[CONT] [Dragocross](Any)This creature gets +1/+0.

name: Dark Puppeteer
flavor: It can breathe life into inanimate objects, but sometimes the magic fails, and the object shatters…
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, discard a card from your hand at random. If that card is a cost 3 or less creature, summon it.

name: Esseria the Cruel
flavor: A sadistic angel that enjoys tormenting her victims, slowly inflicting pain on them and letting them bleed out.
ability:
[AUTO] When this creature deals damage to a fort, if you have two or more red creatures, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, choose an opposing creature, and deal 3 damage to it.
[CONT] [Dragocross](Red)This creature gets +1/+0.

name: Augmented Hellbound
flavor: Even demons could use a little help.
ability:
[AUTO] When this creature attacks, all of your machines get Deadly for this turn.
[AUTO] When your other creature is destroyed, you may put it on the bottom of your deck, and draw a card.

name: Augmented Cragborn
flavor: Cruel upgrades will help it do what it does best.
ability: [ACT] [Siphon Black X] Choose a cost X or less machine from your discard pile, summon it, and discard a card from your hand. This ability can only be used once per turn. (X must be 1 or more.)

name: Remorseful Succubus
flavor: She keeps a soul captive within the cage, but why she looks so melancholy, none can say.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, choose up to two of your opponent's resources, your opponent shuffles them back into their deck, and at the end of your opponent's next turn, your opponent puts a card from the top of their deck into their resource zone for each card put into their deck.

name: Fender Bender
flavor: Best to cover your ears, now.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is [Dragocross](Black), you may change the value of one of your dice to match one of your other black dice, or change the value of one of your black dice to match one of your other dice.

name: Vivacious Vampire
flavor: She enjoys playing with her food before she eats it.
ability:
Ambush[②] (You may pay ② to play this card from your hand face-down at one of your forts.)
[AUTO] When this creature is summoned, choose an opposing yellow or green creature, and destroy it.
[AUTO] When a creature at this fort is destroyed during your opponent's turn and this card is an ambush, you may summon this creature.

name: Dread Gravekeeper
flavor: It exhumes corpses it deems fit to serve.
ability: [ACT] [Siphon X] Choose a cost X or less creature from your discard pile, and put it on the top of your deck. If you siphoned a red die for this ability's cost, this creature gets +1/+0 for this turn. (X must be 1 or more.)

name: Grotesque Cragborn
flavor: They were carved to look fearsome, but this specimen is particularly ugly.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, choose one of each player's resources, and destroy them.

name: Ravenous Gargoyle
flavor: Considering they're creatures of stone, they don't actually have to eat. That doesn't mean they don't hunger.

name: Augmented Stonegazer
flavor: The rays from her mechanical arms are able to paralyze whatever they strike.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, you may choose one of your other machines, and destroy it. If you do, draw two cards.

name: Bewitching Stonegazer
flavor: The more beautiful they are, the more dangerous they tend to be.
ability:
[CONT] This creature gets +1/+0 for each of your red creatures.
[Fort Burst] Summon this creature. (Fort Burst: When this card is a barrier, and would be put to your hand due to damage, you may play this ability instead.)

name: Cragborn Proudstalker
flavor: Gargoyles are animated via magic, so it is no surprise that the animation process sometimes gives them certain magical capabilities.
ability:
[AUTO] When this creature is summoned, if you have a red creature, choose an opposing creature or an opposing [Dragoshield], and deal 1 damage to it.
[CONT] [Dragocross](Red)This creature gets +2/+0.

name: Risen Crusader
flavor: The magic that reanimates it also grants it unholy might, which explains why a pile of bones can lift a giant hammer.

name: Forgotten Acolyte
flavor: It has overcome the mindlessness of the undead, and still prays to the gods it once worshiped.
ability: [AUTO] [Dragocross](Black)When this creature is destroyed, draw a card.

name: Drag into the Abyss
flavor: Once darkness has a hold, there is no escape.
ability:
As part of the cost to play this spell, choose any number of your creatures, and destroy them. Your opponent chooses X of their creatures, and destroys them, where X is the number of your creatures that were destroyed.
[Fort Burst] Put this card into your discard pile, choose up to two creatures in your discard pile, and return them to your hand.

name: Devour
flavor: Into the endless abyss of a demon's gut.
ability: Each player shuffles all of their resources back into their deck.

name: Supreme Power
flavor: She holds back much of her strength while fighting, if only to enjoy the battle a little longer.
ability: Choose a [REST] creature, and destroy it.

name: Back from the Grave
flavor: Nothing stays dead forever.
ability:
As part of the cost to play this spell, Siphon Black X. (X must be 1 or more.)
Choose a cost X or less creature from your discard pile, and summon it.

name: Yvel, Lord of the Skies
flavor: The heavens are its domain.
ability:
[AUTO] [Dice 1-4](Yellow)When this creature attacks, you may move a barrier from an opposing fort to another opposing fort.
[AUTO] [Dice 3-6](Yellow)When this creature is summoned, draw cards until there are four cards in your hand.
[AUTO] [Dragocross](Any)When this creature attacks, cost 1 or less creatures cannot block for this turn.

name: Gravos, Lord of the Loam
flavor: The forests are its refuge.
ability:
[AUTO] [Dice 1-4](Green)At the end of your turn, [STAND] all of your creatures with 6 or more EDR.
[AUTO] [Dice 3-6](Green)When this creature is summoned, all of your creatures get +0/+5 for this turn.
[AUTO] [Dragocross](Any)When this creature attacks, all of your creatures get +1/+0 for this turn.

name: Ulrisc, Lord of the Glacier
flavor: The ocean is its territory.
ability:
[AUTO] (Blue)When this creature attacks, choose an opposing creature, and [REST] it.
[AUTO]  (Blue)When this creature is summoned, choose an opposing creature, [REST] it, and it does not [STAND] during your opponent's next stand step.
[AUTO] [Dragocross](Any)When this creature attacks, return all cost 1 or less creatures to their owners' hands.

name: Eldrun, Lord of the Blaze
flavor: The battlefield is its kingdom.
ability: (Red)When this creature attacks, choose an opposing creature. For this battle, this creature's attack must be blocked by that creature if able.  (Red)When this creature is summoned, it gets " When this creature deals damage to a fort, it deals 2 damage instead." for this turn.   When this creature destroys a blocking creature in battle, deal 1 damage to the fort being attacked.

name: Sennes, Lord of the Rampage
flavor: The realm is its arena.
ability: (Black)When this creature attacks, choose a cost 2 or less creature from your discard pile, and return it to your hand.  (Black)When this creature is summoned, your opponent discards all but one card from their hand.  (Any)If your opponent has two or less cards in their hand, this creature cannot be blocked by creatures.
